name: Anhlinh Thuoc Lo Ban
author: Thanhansoft

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload and select the anhlinh-thuoc-lo-ban.zip file from your hard disk
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Insert short code info post: [thuoc-lo-ban]

Manual installation

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory via ftp
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Does this “Anhlinh Thuoc Lo Ban” plugin make the page functional?

Are not. inline css, and only show when used
sections.description:
Tool Thước Lỗ Ban online, online hole ruler tool, Ruler for people working in the field of construction.
Optimized CSS inline, shortcode, bind css and javascript when have post useing shortcode.
Users can upgrade to the Pro version that displays text when draping

Arbitrary section 1
